attributes.action: Kelloggs to produce cocoa krispies cereal straws again
attributes.additional_details: Cereal is the most important part of the day and these snacks help fussy children to have something to eat in the morning they are also delicious and very handy.
attributes.background: Everybody used to enjoy these fun snacks and they was useful for sucking up the coco pops milk left over from the cereal but unfortunately got discontinued due to the their release of the cereal Crave and also a decline in sales (0.2%).
